about_the_game:
Game Contents

This is a simulator that lets you dress up girls in various outfits and film them.
The video footage can be saved locally in mp4 format.

Custom elements

You can dress up a girl in any of the following 5 kinds of costumes and take a sex shot.
Bunny girl
Gym uniform
China dress
Cheerleader
Micro Bikini
(+ full nudity)

You can also choose the girl's reaction from joy, anger, sadness, and expressionless face.
You can also choose from a variety of facial expressions, such as a face or a face with no facial expression.
You can change the skin color, hair color, etc. of the girls as you like.
Sweat, blush, pallor, and other effects are also available.
Take pictures with your favorite screen effects!

others
Sensitivity can be changed for both men and women.

Subtitles ON/OFF available.
English and Simplified Chinese translation available
Auto mode available

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content. The sexual content in this game includes SM-like sexual content, sexual assault/non-consensual sex, etc. All characters depicted are over the age of 20.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: intel core i5 compatible
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

short_description: This is a simulator that lets you dress up girls in various outfits and film them. You can save the video in mp4 format locally. You can dress a girl in your favorite clothes from 5 kinds of cosplay and take a sex video of her.

*languages with full audio support
